title: Fentanyl and Heroin Task Force Act
content: Fentanyl and Heroin Task Force Act This bill amends the Controlled Substances Act to establish the Fentanyl and Heroin Inter-Agency Task Force: (1) to coordinate federal efforts to identify, target, and dismantle organizations that traffic fentanyl or heroin. (2) to identify sources of fentanyl and heroin production and distribution. And (3) to provide best practices, updated information, and support to federal, state, and local law enforcement agencies.
